name: The International Conference on Surveying and Geoinformation
content: The International Conference on Surveying and Geoinformation (CSG 2021) Conference Date: June 1-3, 2021 Conference Venue: Guilin, China Website: https://www.confjune.org/conference/CSG2021/ Online Registration System: http://www.confjune.org/RegistrationSubmission/default.aspx?ConferenceID=1409 Email: Editor\_contact@163.com The International Conference on Surveying and Geoinformation (CSG 2021) will be held from June 1-3 in Guilin, China. This Conference will cover issues on Surveying and Geoinformation. The aim of CSG 2021 is to provide a stage for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their latest research results and advanced research methods. If you wish to serve the conference as an invited speaker, please send email to us with your CV. We'll contact with you asap.
